news.title: Nagpur civic body sets daily property tax collection target of Rs 1.48 crore
news.para: The standing committee headed by Prakash Bhoyar had set a target of Rs332.49 crore for the current financial year, but property tax recovery till October end was Rs96.46 crore.

news.title: Nashik civic body takes up special drive to collect property tax
news.para: As per the norms, the properties should obtain the completion certificate after the construction is completed. The NMC then levies property tax on such properties. But in many cases, properties are utilised without getting the certificate.

news.title: Ludhiana: Realtors claim PSPCL's refusal to connect regularised colonies affecting business
news.para: Deepak Badyal, general secretary of Punjab Property Dealers and Colonisers Association, said, "even after payment of fee and getting NOC from authorities like GLADA, power connections are being refused to them by PSPCL on the pretext that the colony in which their plot is located is not approved.

news.title: Puravankara posts profit of Rs 12 crore in Q2 FY22
news.para: The board of Puravankara also approved the issue of fully secured, unlisted, rated, non-convertible debentures via private placement. The size of the issue is Rs 180 crore in one or more tranches.

news.title: RERA can delegate its powers to hear complaints from homebuyers: SC
news.para: The top court said the scheme of the Act, 2016, provides an in-built mechanism and any order passed on a complaint by the authority is appealable, if any manifest error is left by the authority either in computation or in the amount refundable to the allottee/homebuyer.

news.title: ED attaches properties worth Rs 18.14 crore of Unitech owners
news.para: These assets are in the name of M/s Enova Facility Management Services Private Limited and M/s FNM property Services Private Limited which are proxy or benami entities of Chandras, the financial probe agency said.

news.title: Hyderabad civic body issues 864 TDRs to acquire 350 acres
news.para: "the property owners are also willing to part with their land while obtaining TDR certificates in lieu of cash compensation, since the demand for issue and utilisation of TDR has increased rapidly,” read an official release issued by the GHMC

news.title: Noida: Flats illegal, Shahberi builder told to pay 10% of cost to five buyers
news.para: While looking for budget properties in the bracket of Rs 20-25 lakh, these five petitioners had bought flats in Shahberi village between 2015 and 2017. Shahberi hit the headlines in July 2018, when two such illegal buildings had collapsed, killing nine persons in total.

news.title: IDFC First Bank leases Citibank's erstwhile HQ tower in Mumbai from Mindspace REIT
news.para: The deal is another sign of the recovery in office leasing, not only in peripheral but also in prime business districts following the aggressive vaccinations and the gradual return of employees to offices.

news.title: Grasim Industries' net profit up 27.36% to Rs 2,032.41 crore in Q2 FY22
news.para: Revenue from cement business UltraTech Cement was up 15.69 per cent to Rs 12,016.80 crore as against Rs 10,387.14 crore in the corresponding quarter of the previous fiscal.

news.title: Asian Granito India posts net profit of Rs 54 crore in Q2 FY22
news.para: Asian Granito India's net consolidated total income stood at Rs 414.57 crore in Q2 FY22, a growth of 20 per cent from Rs 344.72 crore it registered in the similar quarter last year.

news.title: Ansal Properties & Infrastructure posts net loss of Rs 29 crore in Q2 FY22
news.para: Ansal Properties & Infrastructure's net consolidated total income stood at Rs 146.10 crore in Q2 FY22, a dip of 37 per cent from Rs 231.41 crore it registered in the similar quarter last year.

news.title: Mindspace REIT posts net operating income of Rs 359.20 crore in Q2 FY22
news.para: The governing board of K Raheja Corp Investment Managers LLP, manager of Mindspace Business Parks REIT has declared distribution of Rs 272.80 crore/Rs 4.60 per unit for the quarter ended September 30, 2021.

news.title: Ashiana Housing posts net loss of Rs 5.74 crore in Q2 FY22
news.para: Ashiana Housing's net consolidated total income stood at Rs 60.69 crore in Q2 FY22, a growth of 21 per cent from Rs 50.05 crore it registered in the similar quarter last year.

news.title: China's Yango Group, investors agree to extend dollar bond maturities: Source
news.para: Due to technical reasons, the company is still soliciting bondholders' approval for a payment extension on a February 2023 dollar bond putable on Friday, but the bond is not considered to be in default, the source said.
